Name: Bafata
Description: Bafata is located in central Guinea-Bissau, known for its agricultural production and historic significance.

Name: Biombo
Description: Biombo is a coastal region near Bissau, known for its fishing industry and trade.

Name: Bolama
Description: Bolama is an archipelago region with a rich colonial history and a strong fishing industry.

Name: Cacheu
Description: Cacheu is located in the northwestern part of the country, known for its historical sites and rice farming.

Name: Gabu
Description: Gabu is the easternmost region of Guinea-Bissau, known for its livestock farming and ethnic diversity.

Name: Oio
Description: Oio is the largest region by area, located in the north-central part of the country, known for agriculture and cashew production.

Name: Quinara
Description: Quinara is a southwestern region known for its lush forests and agricultural activities.

Name: Tombali
Description: Tombali is located in the southern part of Guinea-Bissau, known for its coastal access and agriculture.
